subject: Hospitals
lead_paragraph: Commissioner Roger Goodell visited the injured Bills tight end Kevin Everett, who sustained a severe spinal cord injury. Goodell flew to Buffalo from New York and spent 90 minutes with Everett and his mother, Patricia Dugas, in the player’s room at Millard Fillmore Gates Hospital, a hospital spokesman said.
